headline.main: Police Leaders Unveil Principles Intended to Shift Policing Practices Nationwide
headline.print_headline: Police Leaders Urge New Set of Standards

abstract: Police Executive Research Forum releases recommendations for changes to standard police practices at Washington, DC, event attended by around 200 law enforcement leaders from across country; proposed changes come at time when many questions have been raised about criminal justice system, particularly with respect to police shootings.
